headline: Jim Cramer on American Express: “This Has One of the Most Reliably Unreliable Patterns”
summary: American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) is one of the stocks in Jim Cramer’s game plan for this week. Cramer said that after earnings, the stock usually declines, which presents a buying opportunity. He commented: “Finally, Friday, well, we hear from American Express. headline: American Express (AXP) Stock Is Up, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of global payments company American Express (NYSE:AXP) jumped 2.9% in the afternoon session after a new partnership with RewardPay was announced, creating a tax pooling payment system designed to reward businesses in New Zealand.

headline: United States Digital Payment Forecast Report 2025-2033, Competitive Analysis of ACI, Aliant Payment, Amazon, American Express, Apple, Fiserv, Mastercard, Novetti, Paypal, Visa
summary: The United States Digital Payment Market is set to experience remarkable growth, increasing from USD 3.06 trillion in 2024 to USD 9.29 trillion by 2033, with a CAGR of 13.11% from 2025 to 2033. Key drivers include high smartphone and internet penetration, evolving payment technologies, and changing consumer behavior. Digital platforms such as mobile wallets and online banking are gaining traction due to their convenience and security. The COVID-19 pandemic accelerated digital payment adoption, m

headline: Turn Market Volatility Into Income This Earnings Season
summary: Earnings season is here and we’ve got the first batch of big name companies reporting earnings this week with Taiwan Semiconductor, JP Morgan Chase, Wells Fargo, Bank of America, Goldman Sachs, Johnson & Johnson and American Express all set to report.

headline: Earnings Season Is Revving Up. Here's What to Expect.
summary: With about 35 members of the S&P 500 due to report results this week, third-quarter earnings season is getting into full swing.  However, actual earnings growth could come in considerably higher, at 13%, the data provider said.  Companies tend to overshoot Wall Street estimates, with three-quarters of earnings reports over the past 10 years beating forecasts.

headline: RewardPay Unlocks First-Ever Tax Pooling Payments with Rewards for New Zealand Businesses
summary: Rewardpay.co.nz, the leading B2B fintech platform transforming how businesses pay suppliers and get rewarded, today announced a market-first: integrated tax pooling payments that reward businesses – a breakthrough in how tax pooling is managed.
